citeinfo.origin: Tohoku National Fisheries Research Institute (TNFRI), Fisheries Oceanography Division
citeinfo.title: Oyashio Intensive Observation Line Off Cape Erimo (OICE)

descript.abstract:
This repeated observation line parallels the track 060 of the TOPEX/POSEIDON satellite orbit. Observation data includes CTD, mooring type, hydrographic data, and parent tide flow from 1993 to 2002. Complete Abstract available at http://jpac.whoi.edu/images/Ito.pdf.
[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
descript.purpose: To monitor the inter-annual variability of the Oyashio structure and transport.
